name: Signup Stripe Vercel Deploy
description: A Next.js 16 application enabling user signup, Stripe payments, and programmatic Vercel project deployments with AI-powered features

stories.title: Local development environment setup
stories.description: Clear instructions to get the project running locally with all dependencies
acceptance: README.md contains complete setup instructions
Clone repository and run `bun install`
Copy `.env.example` to `.env.local` and configure variables
Run `docker compose up -d` to start PostgreSQL
Run `bunx drizzle-kit push` to apply database schema
Run `bun dev` to start development server on localhost:3000
Visit http://localhost:3000 to verify app loads
All environment variables documented in .env.example with descriptions
`bunx biome check .` passes with no errors
`bunx tsc --noEmit` passes with no type errors
`bun run build` completes successfully

stories.title: Initialize Next.js 16 Project with Docker PostgreSQL
stories.description: Bootstrap a new Next.js 16 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, Biome, shadcn/ui, Docker PostgreSQL, Drizzle ORM, and Zod. Use only Next.js API routes for all server-side logic.
acceptance: Created with `bunx create-next-app@latest signup-app --ts --tailwind --biome --app --src-dir --use-bun --no-turbopack --no-import-alias`
Initialized shadcn/ui with `bunx shadcn@latest init -y --base-color=neutral`
Opened in Cursor with `cursor .`
Next.js version 16.x confirmed in package.json
TypeScript strict mode enabled in tsconfig.json
App Router structure with src/app directory
Docker Compose file with PostgreSQL container configured
Drizzle ORM installed and configured with PostgreSQL connection
Zod installed for runtime validation
DATABASE_URL environment variable defined in .env.local
`bun run dev` starts development server on port 3000
`docker compose up -d` starts PostgreSQL database
`bunx biome check .` passes with no errors
`bunx tsc --noEmit` passes with no type errors
`bun run build` completes successfully
